mapper.select: SELECT board_file_no boardFileNo, board_file_ori boardFileOri, board_file_save boardFileSave, board_file_type boardFileType FROM board_file WHERE board_no = #{boardNo}
SELECT board_file_ori boardFileOri, board_file_save boardFileSave, board_file_type boardFileType FROM board_file WHERE board_file_no = #{boardFileNo}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO board_file ( board_no, board_file_ori, board_file_save, board_file_type, board_file_size, createdate, updatedate ) VALUES ( #{boardNo}, #{boardFileOri}, #{boardFileSave}, #{boardFileType}, #{boardFileSize}, NOW(), NOW() )
